name: Dragon's Power
description:
Console app, made for a sophomore project.

Project made in c#.

History:

For a long time the kingdoms have been united by various dragons with power, but defenseless, they had not developed any skills due to the comfort in which they found themselves.

The dragons lived in harmony and celebrated parties with everyone in the kingdom. Until the king of a Spicus kingdom wanted the absolute power of his kingdom by taking away all the power to the dragon without his wanting, becoming a magician. Later others did the same and some became healers and others magicians.

Seeing this, all the kings of each kingdom tried to do the same, giving his kingdom more power, to avoid possible threats.

Many of the dragons fled from the warriors and assassins for hire to maintain their power. Over time they developed skills, and various types of dragons were created, from ice type dragons to fire type dragons.

Now these go through the kingdoms terrorizing people, and your mission is to prevent this from continuing happening, in order to restore the order and peace that once inhabited.

To do this you must defeat the fire dragon of your kingdom called Renius, the problem is that he has created several portals so that it is impossible to reach him.

That's why you must go through each of them, not knowing where they take you, but be careful, this dragon has wanted it not to be easy and that is why he has also created minions like skeletons or ghosts so you can't find it.

Objective: Defeat all the enemies created by the dragon in order to reach him and then defeat him

Rules:

Terrains affect the character in this way:

        Desert: +3 temperature

        Swamp: -1 temp, -1 life

        Dodgy Inn: +1 life, -1 sanity

        Graveyard: -1 sanity

        Meadow: +1 sanity, +1 life, temperature = 36

        Tundra: -3 temperature

Ways the character can die:

        Temperature: <30, >42

        Life: <=0

        Sanity: <=0

Ways to move around the board:

        Forwards

        Backward

Order in which enemies appear on the map:

        3 Skeleton

        2 Ghost

        1 Dragon

Maximum quantity for each object:

        Bomb: 6

        Potion: 3

        Armor: 2

        Encyclopedia: 2
